posts.content:
For sale 1964 RHD split screen restoration project original engine gearbox and running gear. All doors in good condition, all window glass and front seats included .New correct fit wheel arches supplied .Boxes of misc. spare parts will be included. The log book will have to be applied for once the van is mot'd birth cert to confirm van was manufactured on the 24th jan 1964. Vin and chassis numbers match . The correspondence from the dvla says log book will be issued once van is mot,d. I have one too many projects so need to free up this one.
Â£6.500 no offers call chris 07961 320287 remember this is a rhd sold
hi come on lads this is a easy restoration no one wants a rhd any more i will just have to restore it my self if no one wants it
last chance for some one to get a bargain price reduction 6.500 i could make more if i break it thanks chris

What's the chassis like? Why can't you get a log book? Don't need an mot for one.


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
the reason why i no log book is because at some time the number was transferred on a car and the van was fond in a barn so dvla wont give me i new on with out mot the van is sold now thanks chris
